thread.title: Trump says Homeland Security instructed to check people
thread.title_full: Trump says Homeland Security instructed to check people

title: Trump says Homeland Security instructed to check people
text: show ad 'If something happens blame him': Trump tweets that the judge who halted immigration ban has put the U.S. in danger as he's pictured taking in a round of golf in Mar-a-Lago President Donald Trump took to Twitter Sunday afternoon to express his frustration over a judge's decision to place a temporary stay on his travel ban He wrote: 'Just cannot believe a judge would put our country in such peril. If something happens blame him and court system. People pouring in. Bad!' He then added: 'I have instructed Homeland Security to check people coming into our country VERY CAREFULLY. The courts are making the job very difficult!' The president was spotted leaving Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach to return to his Mar-a-Lago retreat
